rukus.text: bulleo mo-eula malsseum-i iss-euni joeindeulgwa geudeul-ui anaedeulgwa geudeul-i sungbaehaessdeon geosdeul-ila
hananim oee sungbaehan geosdeul-i la geulihayeo hananim-eun geudeul-eul bul jiog-eulo annaehayeo
geudeul-eul meomchuge hani geudeul-eun jilmun-eul badge doenola
neohuiga seolo dobji moshaneun geos eun eojjidoen il-inyo
geuleohji moshanila geunal geudeul eun simpan-e bogjonghage doenani
geudeul-eun seolo dagaseomyeo seolo ga seolo-ege jilmunhadeola
sillo neohuiga oleunpyeon-eulo bu teo uliege wass-eumyeo lago malhani
anila neohui seuseuloga mid-eum i eobs-eossnola
ulineun neohuileul daseulil amu leon himdo eobsdoda geugeos-eun ohilyeo neohuiga omanhan baegseongjung-e iss-eossnola
jinliin junim-ui malsseum-i ibjeung doeeoss-euni ije ulineun uli joee daehan beol-eul bad-aya hal ppun-ila
sillo ulineun neohuileul banghwangke haess-eumyeo uli seuseulodo banghwanghaessnola
sillo geudeul moduneun geunal beol-eulbad-eum-e hamkke halila
hananim-eun ileohdeus joejieun ja leul daseulini
hananim oee sin-i eobsdaneun malsseum-i geudeul-ege iss-eoss-eul ttae geudeul-eun omanhagon hayeoss-eumyeo
jejeongsin-i anin siin-eul wiha yeo uliui sindeul-eul pogihaeya doeneu nyo lago geudeul-eun malhaessdeola
geuleohji anhnola geuneun jinlilo dolaehayeo seonjijadeul-eul hwagjeunghayeossnola
sillo neohuineun gotongseuleoun beol eul masbol geos-iyo
neohuiga haenghan geos-eulo daegaleul bad-eulila
geuleona seongsilhan hananim-ui jong deul-eun je-uiimyeo
geudeul-eul wihaeseoneun allyeojin il yonghal yangsig-i iss-euni
gippeum-ui gwaildeulgwa myeong-yewa jon eom-i geugeos-ila
geudeul-eun gajang chugbogbad-eun cheongug eseo
uija-e anj-a seolo majubogo anj-aseo
heuleuneun saemmul-eseo jan-eulo sunbaeleul deulge doenani
geugeos-eun sujeong-gat-i hayahgo ma sineun ideul-ege mas-i issdeola
geugeos-eun meoliga apeuji ani hago chwihajido anhdeola
geudeul juwieneun sungyeolhan yeoseong deul-i issnani geunyeoui nun-eun jal boho doeeossgo nun-eun keugo aleumdaumae
machi jal bohobad-eun dalgyalgwa gat deola
geudeul-eun seolo majubomyeo seolo ga jilmun-eul hani
geu jung-e han salam-i mal-eul si jaghadeola hyeonseeseo jeoege han chin guga iss-eossneunde
geuga malhagil dangsin-eun gyesileul midneunja jung-e issneunyo
uliga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman namneundedo bosang-gwa beol-eul badneundan mal inyo
ittae yeoleobun-i naelyeoda bogo sip-eungayo laneun han eumseong-i deullyeowa
geuga naelyeowa bogo jiog-e issneun geu chinguleul balgyeonhagoseo
geuga malhagil hananimkke maengse hanani neoneun naleul myeolmang-eulo yuhog halyeo haessnola
nae junim-ui eunhyega eobs-eossdeondeul sillo naneun geugos-e kkeullyeoon jajung-e iss-eoss-eulila
uliga jugji anihal geos-ila neun geos-eun geuwa gatji anhneunyo
uliga hanbeon jug-eumyeon beol-eul badji anihal geos-ila saeng-gaghaessneunyo
sillo igeos-eun choehuui seunglila
ileohan geoss-eul wihayeo modeun ingan-eun nolyeoghaeya doenila
geuwa gat-eun hwandaega deo na-eunyo animyeon jakkumu namuga deo na-eunyo
hananim-eun joeindeul-eul wihan si heom-eulo geugeos-eul dueossnola
geugeos-eun buljiog-ui mitbadag-eseo jalaneun namulo
yeolmaeleul maejneun saessag-eun satan-ui udumeolideulgwa gat-euni
geudeul-eun geugeos-eul meog-eo baeleul chaeumyeo
geu wie igeulgeolineun mul-i deo hayeo chaewojigo
geudeul-eun taoleuneun buljiog-eulo hyanghanila
geudeul-eun banghwanghaneun geudeul-ui seon jodeul-eul balgyeonhago
seodulleo geudeul-ui baljachwileul tta lassnola
geudeul ijeon-ui manh-eun seonjodeuldo banghwanghago iss-eossdeola
hananim-i geudeul gaunde han seonjijaleul bonaeeo geudeul-eul chung-gohadolog hayeoss-euni
gyeong-goleul badgodo juuihaji a nihan ideul-ui jongmal-i eotteo haessdeonyo
geuleona hananim-ui seongsilhan jong deul-eun je-oela
